games.title: Baba Game
games.description: A fun casual game where you mark places you've visited. Explore different locations and collect achievements!
games.controls: Use mouse or touch to interact with the game interface. Click on locations to mark them as visited.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Snake Game
games.description: The classic Snake game where you control a snake to eat food and grow longer. Be careful not to hit the walls or yourself!
games.controls: Use Arrow Keys to move the snake. Eat the food to grow longer. Avoid hitting walls and your own tail.

games.title: Space Shooter
games.description: Defend Earth from waves of alien invaders in this classic arcade-style space shooter. Dodge enemy fire and collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons.
games.controls: Use Arrow Keys or WASD to move your spaceship. Press Space to shoot. Avoid enemy ships and their projectiles.

games.title: Tetris
games.description: The classic block-stacking puzzle game. Arrange falling blocks to create complete lines and prevent the blocks from stacking up to the top.
games.controls: Use Arrow Left/Right to move, Arrow Down to speed up descent, Arrow Up to rotate, Space to hard drop.

games.title: Tower Defense
games.description: Classic tower defense game where you build defensive towers to prevent enemy invasion. Plan your resources wisely and survive 10 waves of enemies!
games.controls: Click to select tower type, then click on the map to place it. Basic Tower ($50): Normal attack; Cannon Tower ($100): High damage; Ice Tower ($150): Slows enemies.
games.author: LightGame Team
features: Three different types of defense towers: Basic Tower, Cannon Tower, and Ice Tower
Multiple enemy types including Normal, Fast, and Tank enemies
10 waves of enemies with increasing difficulty
Resource management system to allocate money for building towers
